function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Provide subsidy, tax exemptions, and workers’ training for transitioning to sustainable sectors, and introduce policies like universal basic income","category":"Proactive adaptation towards a greener, more sustainable, and equitable society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote education and cultural awareness, involve communities in decision-making processes, and provide resources for sustainable adaptation","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote a sense of mutual care for common goods and collaboration, and encourage sustainable consumption patterns","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote nature-centered education and awareness programs, emphasize the importance of a healthy biosphere","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote ethics of land integrity, minimal ownership, and nature-centered education","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and remote collaboration practices.","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Targeted education and awareness programs for vulnerable age and marital groups","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focused testing and prevention campaigns in clustered areas, improved access to healthcare services","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase the availability of gynecologic oncologist specialists in rural areas, implement telemedicine for specialist consultations, and provide financial assistance for travel to urban centers","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Raise awareness among primary care providers about the importance of timely referral, improve access to transportation for rural patients, and implement education and training programs for healthcare professionals in rural areas","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve coordination between primary care providers and specialist centers, reduce administrative barriers to specialist referrals, and implement expedited pathways for rural patients with suspected ovarian cancer","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing proper ventilation systems, air filters, and air purification technologies.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enforcing strict sanitation protocols, promoting hand hygiene, and regular cleaning of surfaces.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limiting occupancy, promoting social distancing, and staggered use of communal spaces.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement targeted, non-coercive community interventions with transparency and public engagement","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear and verified communication from national and international health authorities","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement alternative quarantine measures such as voluntary home quarantine and telehealth concepts","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement new guidelines for funerals to reduce crowding and transmission risk","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement early community mitigation measures and travel restrictions","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of targeted and efficient future political measures. development of effective herd immunity through vaccination.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting empirical evaluation of prevailing contact restrictions and development of region-specific interventions based on socio-economic factors.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct additional individual-level studies to supplement group-level analysis","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation of group-level findings with individual-level studies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement targeted public health interventions for vulnerable populations","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Thorough research and statistical analysis to accurately identify and understand the influence of socio-economic factors on covid-19 transmission.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of coordinated regional containment measures and collaboration between neighboring regions to control the spread.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting quantitative investigations to assess the impact of dwelling size, tourism, and sectoral structure on covid-19 transmission. implement targeted interventions based on the results.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting combined studies that investigate both clinical and socio-economic factors","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting in-depth analyses of socio-economic factors at the regional level in germany","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing social distancing measures and restricting large gatherings, improving public health infrastructure","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrating spatial econometric models to account for spatial spillover effects, analyzing localized outbreaks","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating socio-economic covariates into spatial analysis, addressing disparities in access to healthcare and resources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use in conjunction with clinical studies for a comprehensive understanding.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use statistical methods to estimate the dark figure of unreported cases.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene measures and monitoring in children’s homes","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of air purifiers, ventilation systems, and monitoring of air quality","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing efficient air flow design and using efficient filtration systems","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Supplementing with other air purification methods or technologies","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Promote ventilation and air purification systems to reduce the concentration of airborne pathogens. implement guidelines for safe use of outdoor spaces.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct thorough environmental impact assessments and implement appropriate design measures to ensure proper ventilation and thermal comfort. educate residents on the safe use of designed outdoor spaces.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving communication with the external environment and social support systems","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure proper ventilation systems, natural lighting, and air quality monitoring in home office spaces.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement zoning regulations and building codes that prioritize adequate spacing and ventilation, and promote the use of technology for virtual communication and remote work.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems and air filtration, wearing masks, and minimizing time spent in enclosed spaces.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enhancing ventilation to remove lingering aerosols, wearing masks, and minimizing time spent in enclosed spaces.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Maintain negative pressure in toilets, use air cleaning equipment","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Keep exhaust system running continuously and ensure negative pressure in the toilet.","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improving filtration and ventilation processes within hvac systems","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Thorough review and evaluation of hvac systems and their suitability for the pandemic situation","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"Low"}]}
